# Request for Standing Offer
***

## Contract Title
### English:
W6856-24V300_Commercial-industrial kitchen equipments maintenance and repair RISO
### French:

## Tender Status
### Status (English):

### Status (French):

## Description
We invite you to submit a bid for the acquisition of Commercial-Industrial kitchen equipment maintenance and repair services in various establishments of the Quebec City area. This Request for Standing Offer (RSO) is issued on behalf of the Department of National Defense.

## Eligibility
This tender is open to all qualified suppliers.

## Evaluation Criteria
### Evaluation Criteria (English):
Lowest Price
### Evaluation Criteria (French):
Prix le plus bas

## Trade Agreements
The contract is subject to the following trade agreements:
  * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  * Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  * Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
  * Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  * Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
  * Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
  * Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
  * World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
  * Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
  * Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
  * Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
  * Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

## Contracting Authority
### Contracting Entity:
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
